trans-unit.source: Represents a condition that compares the value of an activity member to a specified value by using a specified comparison operator.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma condição que compara o valor de um membro de atividade a um valor especificado usando um operador de comparação especificado.

trans-unit.source: You can use an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> to constrain a <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> or an <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition> para restringir uma <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.UserTrackingLocation> ou um <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingLocation>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" />.

trans-unit.source: If you use the default constructor, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se você usar o construtor padrão, você deve definir explicitamente <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>.

trans-unit.source: You must also set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Você também deve definir <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> is `Equals`.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> é `Equals`.

trans-unit.source: The dot delineated name of an activity member.
trans-unit.target: O nome delimitado por ponto de um membro de atividade.

trans-unit.source: The value to be compared
trans-unit.target: O valor a ser comparado

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" /> class by specifying an activity member and a value for comparison.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition" /> especificando um membro de atividade e um valor para comparação.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> is set to `member`, and <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> is set to `value`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> é definido como `member`, e <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> é definido como `value`.

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> is `Equals`.
trans-unit.target: O valor padrão de <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A> é `Equals`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="member" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="member" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the activity member that is to be compared with <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do membro da atividade que deve ser comparado com <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value" />.

trans-unit.source: The dot delineated name of the activity member
trans-unit.target: O ponto delimitados por nome do membro da atividade

trans-unit.source: You can specify an activity property or field, a member of an activity property or field, or a single element of an activity property or field (or a member of either) that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.
trans-unit.target: Você pode especificar uma propriedade de atividade ou um campo, membro do campo ou uma propriedade de atividade ou um único elemento de uma propriedade de atividade ou o campo (ou um membro da) que implementa o <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> interface.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can specify a single element of a collection.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode especificar um único elemento de uma coleção.

trans-unit.source: If you use the default constructor for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se você usar o construtor padrão para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, você deve definir explicitamente <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The value of the specified activity member is compared with <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> by applying <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O valor do membro da atividade especificada é comparado com <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> aplicando <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates accessing the Member property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como acessar a propriedade de membro.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é um exemplo de controle SDK do criador de perfil de.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [exemplo criador de perfil do controle](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).

trans-unit.source: The condition was evaluated and <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: A condição foi avaliada e <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> é uma referência nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: The condition was evaluated and <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> is incorrectly formed.
trans-unit.target: A condição foi avaliada e <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> está formado incorretamente.

trans-unit.source: The condition was evaluated and <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> does not refer to a valid activity member.
trans-unit.target: A condição foi avaliada e <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" /> não faz referência a um membro de atividade válido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the operator that is used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o operador que é usado na comparação.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ComparisonOperator" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Um dos valores de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ComparisonOperator" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Equals" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="Equals" />.

trans-unit.source: Currently only supports `Equals` and `NotEquals`.
trans-unit.target: Atualmente, apenas oferece suporte a `Equals` e `NotEquals`.

trans-unit.source: The value that is to be compared with <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor a ser comparado com <see cref="P:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member" />.

trans-unit.source: The value used in the comparison.
trans-unit.target: O valor usado na comparação.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> is compared to the value of
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A> é comparado com o valor de

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> by applying <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Member%2A> aplicando <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Operator%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If you use the default constructor for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, you must explicitly set <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se você usar o construtor padrão para <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition>, você deve definir explicitamente <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Tracking.ActivityTrackingCondition.Value%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following code sample demonstrates accessing the Value property.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo de código a seguir demonstra como acessar a propriedade de valor.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é um exemplo de controle SDK do criador de perfil de.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [exemplo criador de perfil do controle](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
